entry.tran: (用于构成形容词，表示某种能力上的障碍)听力/视力受损的,有听力/视力障碍的
entry.def: You use -impaired in adjectives where you are describing someone with a particular disability. For example, someone who is hearing-impaired has a disability affecting their hearing, and someone who is visually-impaired has a disability affecting their sight.

example.ex: More than 1 in 20 of the population is hearing-impaired to some extent...
example.tran: 人口总数的 1/20 强在某种程度上存在听力障碍。

example.ex: There are 1.7 million blind and visually impaired people in Britain.
example.tran: 英国有 170 万失明和视力受损人口。
